name: For The King (itch) (GustavusCodingClub)
description:
A turn based strategy game focused around sacrificing people in order to ensure the survival king.

Created in 72 hours for Ludem Dare 46.

Instructions
Keep Your "Noble King Gustavus Adolphus, ruler of his good kingdom, benefactor, sole heir to the throne" alive until reinforcements arrive.

Those dirty peasants and even those nobles who just loiter around the royal court can help.

The jester can taunt and anger anyone he can set his eyes upon.

Credits

Programmers:

Caden Gunnarson

Thomas Hugart

Art/ Sound:
